caseTitle: Wafaqi Mohtasib Secretariat, Islamabad. v. S.N.G.P.L, Lahore, etc
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Ombudsman cannot challenge the curtailment of powers vested in him by law or as interpreted by the constitutional courts. Difference between rights and powers enjoyed by the Ombudsman.
